name: Rita Moreno: Just a Girl Who Decided to Go for It
description: A look at the life and work of Rita Moreno from her humble beginnings in Puerto Rico to her success on Broadway and in Hollywood.

review.author: kellyq12
review.heading: Entertaining and Heartwarming
review.reviewBody: This documentary is really interesting from a perspective of how Hollywood and films have changed when it comes to rolls for non-white actors. It's also really inspiring to hear her talk about her general and her outlook on life and how she's managed to get through very difficult times to arrive at a place where she's almost 90 and seems happier than ever!
